name: Rugby 06
description: Rugby 06 delivers the exhilarating gameplay rugby fans expect. Join the world's most prestigious rugby competitions: The Six Nations, Lions Tour, Tri Nations, Guinness Premiership and the Super 14. Gameplay mirrors the real thing, with off-load passes, quick line-outs and quick penalties that encourage attacking, momentum-driven rugby. Get into the game with TV-style presentation, stadiums from all over the world, star players and a legion of new set plays to pile on the pressure and keep their opponents firmly on the back foot. Improved stadium visuals with rolling banners, improved textures, 3D grass, new weather conditions and more New Career Mode - With all new club objectives and performance based offers from rival clubs, only the best managers will survive!
